item.title: MDTI Adds Microsoft Threat Intelligence to Silobreaker
item.description: We are pleased to announce Microsoft Defender Threat Intelligence (MDTI)’s powerful new integration with Silobreaker. Silobreaker produces a reputation score for indicators of compromise (IOCs) based on a variety of open and commercial intelligence sources. Silobreaker users can now also access MDTI’s rich reputation scoring against IOCs, specifically IP addresses and domains, using Silobreaker’s 360 Search. MDTI’s reputation feature combines the power of its raw and finished threat intelligence, which tap into more than 65 trillion daily threat signals, machine learning algorithms, and over 8...
